abstract: The trial brought by a group of large institutional investors may offer a window into the sale of asset-backed securities.
snippet: The trial brought by a group of large institutional investors may offer a window into the sale of asset-backed securities.
lead_paragraph: A securities fraud trial involving some of the biggest names on Wall Street begins Tuesday in New York, opening a window into the sale of asset-backed securities.

headline.main: Fraud Trial to Focus on Accounting at Heilig-Meyers
headline.print_headline: Fraud Trial to Focus on Accounting at Heilig-Meyers
